entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide a Way to Keep GlobalSuppressions.cs Clean #72212
  • Generate a class or type in Visual Studio 2019 #72209
  • Wrap and align call chains - auto formating #72208
  • Don't Show GlobalSuppressions.cs When Supressing Issue #72206
  • Compare files from source generators #72205
  • `OpenProjectAsync` logger's parameter is unused (public API) #72202
  • List pattern is not correctly formatted in the first case of a switch expression #72196
    Backlog

Closed

  • Cannot `foreach` over a variable passed by `ref` when `GetEnumerator` implemented as a by-ref extension method #72004
    17.10
  • Unable to implement interface event on class with primary constructor and custom event accessors. #72207
  • CS9210 regression in .NET 8.0.200 SDK #72170
  • Compiler freeze with custom assembly attribute #71970
    17.10
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34620.00 #72198

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable OSX queues #72218
  • Improvements to classification perf with large string literals. #72217
  • Do all parsing work using InProgressState translation actions in the compilation tracker #72215
  • Reduce byte[] allocations when opening files #72214
  • WIP: Reduce ImmutableDictionary allocations under SolutionCompilationState by using ImmutableSegmentedDictionary #72213
  • WIP: Reduce ImmutableDictionary allocations under SolutionCompilationState #72211
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Re-enable GetAsyncEnumerator optional parameter asserts #72204
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, untriaged
  • Fix asserts when emitting calls with optional byref parameters #72203
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid using source generators in non-NetCurrent source build #72200
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix excessive CPU classify large string literals with tons of embedded classifications in them. #72216
  • Update to 8.0.0 in 17.10 branch #71916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prepare the FabricBot config for migration to Policy Service #72127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Parse syntax trees in parallel when producing initial compilations #72195
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix broken link #72173
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Add compilation start / stop ETW events #72031
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update Lock object feature status #72201
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type, Next
  • Add caching for Regex creation in AnalyzerConfigSet #72114
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add/remove Razor EA IVTs #72186
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [17.9] Fix rethrowing in nested async catch #72181
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove obsoleted constructor #72194
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72199
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge tuple into a single type representing same values. #72188
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #72197
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Cache frozen solution snapshots at the solution level (not the SolutionCompilationState level). #72193
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove code not used in product #72152
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add feature to strike out obsolete symbols #72156
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add missing IClientRequestManager implementation to EA.Xaml #72187
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce string allocations from `GetCategoryBasedDotnetAnalyzerDiagnosticSeverityKey` #72163
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix Introduce Parameter Crash #72191
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Keep as much parsed state as we can when producing frozen compilations #72184
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify how frozen partial documents are produced. #72106
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #68771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove at most 1 end of line preceding redundant nullable directives #72150
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Support UnscopedRef attribute on interface methods and properties #72171
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Remove redundant null check when using recursive patterns refactor #72185
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce symbol array allocations during CSharpSemanticModel.LookupSymbolsInternal #72153
  • Support relative paths in interceptors #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Remove solution crawler #72147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
